alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes; Morrill; North Sioux; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 10:47PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Box Butte, northeastern Scotts Bluff, northwestern Morrill, western Dawes and Sioux Counties through 1030 PM MDT... At 946 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Montrose to 6 miles northeast of Agate Bed National Monument to near Lake Alice. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mitchell, Crawford, Lake Minatare Campground, Whitney Lake, Agate Bed National Monument, Montrose, Kilpatrick Lake, Fort Robinson Campground, Flahertys Corner, Lake Minatare, Lake Alice, Whitney, Marsland and Fort Robinson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Dawes; Morrill; North Sioux; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux
